Alias.name: Practice Weaves
Alias.script: if weave_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then weave_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for _, item in pairs(weave_trainer.pracs.queue) do send("practice "..item) end end

Alias.name: Show saved setups
Alias.script: for k, v in lfs.dir(getMudletHomeDir().."/weave_trainer") do if k:sub(-4,-1) == ".lua" then cecho(k:sub(1,-5).."\n") end end
